title: i cannot unlock any champs
body: i cannot unlock any champs the unlock button is gray please help me

replies.body: I thiiiiiink I see what's preventing you from buying any champions. I looked into your account and it looks like you don't actually have enough IP/RP to purchase anyone, which is why that button is grayed out. Once you have enough points to unlock the champion you want, that button will turn orange and you'll be able to click it!
